questions.question: What is the professional role of the chairperson of the Congolese Party of Labour?
questions.system_answer: The chairperson of the Congolese Party of Labour (Parti Congolais du Travail, PCT) serves as the party’s chief executive and political leader. questions.question: Where did the religion associated with the Bagratuni Dynasty come into existence?
questions.system_answer: The Bagratuni dynasty was an Armenian house, and the faith that defined it was the Armenian Apostolic Church. That church was founded in Armenia itself – it became the state religion of the Armenian kingdom in the early 4th century, when King Tiridates III converted to Christianity (around 301 AD). Thus, the religion associated with the Bagratuni dynasty came into existence in Armenia.
